'''1.5.1 Build 13''' is the thirteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released in 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Problems with downloading versionlist in updater.
* Tooltips not showing on all user control buttons.
* Finished new Player Management tab.
